<!-- RAG Pipeline for Finance Document Chatbot -->

## Project Overview
This is a comprehensive RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline for processing 10,000 pages of finance documents containing graphs, technical terms, and complex financial information.

## Key Components
- Document processing and chunking strategies
- Multi-modal embeddings for text and images
- Vector database implementation
- Query rewriting and optimization
- Advanced retrieval and re-ranking
- LLM integration for technical finance queries
- Evaluation metrics and reference tracking

## Architecture
- Data ingestion pipeline
- Chunking and embedding service
- Vector database (production-ready)
- Query processing and rewriting
- Retrieval and re-ranking system
- LLM response generation
- Evaluation and monitoring
